p: In addition to anticancer effects, β-elemene exerted anti-inflammatory effects by downregulating hepatic CD14 expression and suppressing serum TNF- α and endotoxin in CCl4-induced rats [ 78]. β-Elemene lowered the serum AST and ALT levels in rats with CCl4-induced liver damage [ 79]. In addition, β-elemene decreased dendrites and increased the vesicular structure of LX-2 cells, thereby reducing liver fibrosis [ 80]. Similarly, β-elemene injection was found to lower hepatic collagen deposition in CCl 4-induced rats, which might be caused by the reduction in serum angiotensin-II level and hepatic angiotensin-II type 1 receptor mRNA level [ 79].
